Uses of Class
org.anchoranalysis.core.system.path.SplitPath

Packages that use SplitPath 
Package Description
org.anchoranalysis.bean.shared.path
Defines a root path directory on the filesystem whre files are read / written.
org.anchoranalysis.plugin.io.input.path  

  • Uses of SplitPath in org.anchoranalysis.bean.shared.path

    Methods in org.anchoranalysis.bean.shared.path that return SplitPath 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SplitPath RootPath.split​(Path path)
    It splits the *root* portion of the path from the remainder

  • Uses of SplitPath in org.anchoranalysis.plugin.io.input.path

    Methods in org.anchoranalysis.plugin.io.input.path that return SplitPath 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    SplitPath RootPathMap.split​(Path pathIn, String rootName, boolean debugMode)
    Given a path, it splits the *root* portion of the path from the remainder, trying a root identified by the rootName and debugMode (and if this fails, also trying with debugMode==false)
